title: yo so this BM pinging thing
body:
Maybe you guys at riot should address this a little because its getting old. I was thinking for a suggestion to change the question mark ping. Or please make it something I can report a player for. It tilts me off the planet when people spam ping me and induces 30 tons of rage. You cant mute the pings from players. You just get pinged occasionally by players and its not really spam, so its not something I can put as spam. I also dont feel as though this is being taken seriously. Theres literally nothing other than {{champion:126}} top that can tilt me harder. I'd hate for this to be a reason I get reported for being "mean" to my fellow players because it honestly pisses me off. 

There is nothing in the world I can do to remove the BM pings from flooding my screen. I can mute a player (Which by the way, really irritates me that I have to mute about 90% of my teammates), but I cant disable pings from other players. I really dont want to see their pings to be honest. I'd vote to remove them completely if I didnt think other players would defend the idea of keeping the BM pings around. Anyone else here on this one with me? 

Also, maybe there's a way to disable the pings through editing the league of legends folder? My god plz help.

replies.body:
You can type /ignore PLAYERNAME (or ENEMIES or ALL too)and it will block pings as well as mastery emotes. It's pretty awkward to type it on the fly though, specially if they have eccentric names. 

Riot should really make it easier to do it though.
No it won't. Pings and Mastery are unaffected by the muting options in game. Riot has made it pretty clear there is no way to block pings as they want to keep some form of communication.

> [{quoted}](name=Sukishoo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=8LUXekNP,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-02-11T19:36:42.870+0000)
>
> Pings and Mastery are unaffected by the **muting** options in game

> [{quoted}](name=Limmie,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=8LUXekNP,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-02-11T19:15:41.298+0000)
>
> You can type /**ignore**

/ignore =/= /mute

Try reading again.

**"muting options"**

They both do the exact same thing.

Wew I just realized I've been downvoted by 3 people and you've been upvoted by 3 people. Are there really so many clueless people around? Or is this some elaborate ruse by ping spammers to keep people from realizing they can mute their pings? 

Have I been trolled? GG!

> [{quoted}](name=Limmie,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=8LUXekNP,comment-id=00010000000000000001,timestamp=2017-02-11T20:39:42.689+0000)
>
> Wew I just realized I've been downvoted by 3 people and you've been upvoted by 3 people. Are there really so many clueless people around? Or is this some elaborate ruse by ping spammers to keep people from realizing they can mute their pings? 
> 
> Have I been trolled? GG!

You know, this is literally the cancerous arguing that I am talking about that happens in every single game I get, and on top of that, I get the spam pinging too. I dont know who downvoted you, but I do know that if youre being downvoted and hes being upvoted, he MIGHT be right.

All it takes is going to a game and testing it on somebody not on your friends list. What I said is a fact, not an opinion. Reality doesn't change over a majority vote. If I say the Earth is round and somebody says the Earth cubic, my being downvoted won't make the our planet any less rounder and their being upvoted won't make the Earth any squarer. 

I couldn't care less about forum karma or any that, so they can downvote till the cows come home (hell I'll even downvote myself for the heck of it lmao). I just find it hilarious.
Why don't you try it in game before making a fool of yourself?
You already made a fool of yourself because again, IT DOESN'T WORK :)
